metadata.title: CVE-2024-2947 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in Cockpit. Deleting a sosreport with a crafted name viathe Cockpit web interface can lead to a command injection vulnerability,resulting in privilege escalation. This issue affects Cockpit versions 270and newer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-2947` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cockpit - 314-1
cockpit-bridge - 314-1
cockpit-networkmanager - 314-1
cockpit-packagekit - 314-1
cockpit-pcp - 314-1
cockpit-sosreport - 314-1
cockpit-storaged - 314-1
cockpit-system - 314-1
cockpit-tests - 314-1
cockpit-ws - 314-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cockpit package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '314-1').
